const ChBoardData *  data,
ChSquares &  result 
) const [protected]

Finds possible moves by diagonal.

Parameters:
square - square to move from.
data - information about location of other pieces on board.
result - all possible diagonal target squares are added to this parameter.

bool ChPieceBase::isOnBoard ( int  row,
int  column 
) const [protected]

Returns true if square is on board.

Parameters:
row - square row (starting from 0).
column - square column (starting from 0).
Returns:
true if square is on board, false otherwise.

bool ChPieceBase::checkSquare ( const ChSquare &  square,
const ChBoardData *  data,
ChSquares &  result 
) const [protected]

Checks is it possible to move to the square.

Parameters:
square - target square.
data - information about location of other pieces on board.
result - add square to this parameter if it is possible to move to it.
Returns:
true if square is empty or occuped by the piece of opposite color, false otherwise.
